data.title: Press Release
data.meta_description: You asked, and we listened! SUNFLOW is thrilled to announce the introduction of The Shore Thing Chair! data.text:
You asked, and we listened! SUNFLOW is thrilled to announce the introduction of The Shore Thing Chair! The Shore Thing Chair price starts at $110 ($99 each if you order two chairs). Pre-order your favorite colors before they sell out.

The Shore Thing Chair new for 2024 is our lightest and simplest chair weighing just 8 pounds. It features SUNFLOW’s iconic award-winning design, premium materials, and vibrant colors and patterns. The Shore Thing Chair also features arm rests, medium height with the seat approximately 12 inches above the sand, and the backrest reclines to your choice of three positions. Backpack straps are attached to carry the chair easily and comfortably. The Shore Thing Chair is also interchangeable with our thoughtfully designed accessories. All SUNFLOW chairs are produced with rust resistant powder-coated aluminum and marine grade fabric featuring our lifetime warranty for manufacturer defects.

The Original SUNFLOW Chair, as seen on ABC’s Shark Tank, is our lowest and most compact chair design and weighs 9.4 pounds. It features our patented telescoping frame to open full-sized on the beach and to close compactly for transportation and storage. The seat height is approximately 9 inches from the sand and the backrest reclines to your choice of four positions. Backpack straps are attached to carry the chair easily and comfortably. All SUNFLOW chairs are produced with rust resistant powder-coated aluminum and marine grade fabric featuring our lifetime warranty for manufacturer defects.

The High Tide Chair introduced in 2023 is our tallest and widest design weighing a sturdy 12.7 pounds. It features our patented telescoping frame to open full-sized on the beach and close compactly for transportation and storage. The seat height is 15 inches from the sand and the backrest reclines to your choice of three positions. Backpack straps are attached to carry the chair easily and comfortably. All SUNFLOW chairs are produced with rust resistant powder-coated aluminum and marine grade fabric featuring our lifetime warranty for manufacturer defects.

Everyone deserves a day at the beach… And we hope that SUNFLOW can make it the best day ever…

See you at the beach!

Leslie Hsu & Greg Besner, SUNFLOW’s Co-Founders

About SUNFLOW (getsunflow.com):

SUNFLOW features an exciting beach chair collection with beautifully designed chairs that match the modern lifestyle of today’s beachgoers. SUNFLOW introduced The Original SUNFLOW chair in 2020 and was featured on Shark Tank. The products are both fashionable and functional and include many smartly designed accessories.
